title: Brown shade for dying
transcript: Habib Froman says that some people dye their beards and hair with a very dark brown dye so that it looks to the people as if it's black whatever looks to the people it takes the ruling so even if it says on the label dark brown or light brown and when you dye your hair everyone says that this is black then this is black so avoid this and it's not permissible regardless of what the label says what the people see is what the ruling would take place
